GBMGUBA.MX.short_name: GBM ADMINISTRADORA DE ACTV SA D
GBMGUBA.MX.long_name: GBM Fondos de Instrumentos Gubernamentales SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
GBMGUBA.MX.summary: The Fund aims to invest their resources in securities issued, endorsed or accepted by the Federal Government, seeking an equivalent performance to the 28-day cetes rate exclusively. In order to achieve the previously designated, will be selected preferably investments short-term, i.e., less than a year and up to three years. However, the Fund may invest in instruments of long-term, when based on the expected yield, investment models or perspectives of the operator of considers convenient to change the term of investment; in this case the volatility of the price of the Fund will increase and important differences with respect to the objective of the Fund performance may exist. By being classified as discretionary, the Fund may increase the investment term and diversify its portfolio in different governmental instruments according to expectations.
GBMGUBA.MX.family: GBM Administradora de Activos SA de CV

NAFFP28A.MX.long_name: Fondo de Rendimiento Nafinsa SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
NAFFP28A.MX.summary: The Fund is aimed exclusively invest in debt securities governmental, and you will have as reference the annual average of the interbank interest rate to 28 days TIIE28 1 less expenses and taxes generated by each series. The comparison with the rate must be at least for a period of one year, derived from that society has a medium-term horizon.
NAFFP28A.MX.family: Operadora de Fondos Nafinsa SA de CV

NTEMPGA.MX.long_name: Fondo Banorte Ixe 12, S.A. de C.V., F.I.I.D. A
NTEMPGA.MX.summary: The objective of IXEMPM + will be the offer a portfolio exclusively with government debt securities. It will seek to provide a performance similar to that obtained by the curve of revisable bonds and the bonds Government. IXEMPM + will not perform operations with derivative instruments. Since the Fund will invest in debt instruments the main risk is interest rates. It is aimed at investors with a tolerance of medium risk and medium-term liquidity.
NTEMPGA.MX.family: Fondos Banorte IXE SA de CV

VECTFIA.MX.short_name: VECTOR FONDOS SA DE CV VECTOR F
VECTFIA.MX.long_name: Vector Fondo FI SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
VECTFIA.MX.summary: The Fund seeks to provide investors an investment alternative for medium term, enabling them to optimize their resources or liquids, to form combinations with other funds of wholesale or shortest time in another class of assets; the Fund will seek to achieve a profitability according to interest rates that prevail in the medium term. The Fund will invest in direct debt securities or through investment in debt instruments, supplementary shaped which comply with the characteristics set out in this prospectus in a maximum of 20% of the portfolio.
